snippet: I was nearly asphyxiated by hairspray backstage at the Peter Som show, but it was worth it.
abstract: I was nearly asphyxiated by hairspray backstage at the Peter Som show, but it was worth it.
lead_paragraph: I was nearly asphyxiated by hairspray backstage at the Peter Som show, but it was worth it. Not only did I learn how to achieve the sophisticated, fresh-faced look seen on the models but I also learned how to stop making some common beauty mistakes. I even witnessed a few beauty myths get busted.
